name: Questionable Machine Shop
description:
You are the owner of a new machine parts store and because of that, you need to assure that your reputation doesn't fall too low.

Pass 5 days with at least 75% positive reputation to gain the approval of the public.

Made for the Mini Jam. Theme was "Steam"

Music:

Visager - Factory Time

Controls:

  • Arrows to select different parts
  • Click the customer when you have the correct combination to complete their order
  • Press the shovel button to get new parts
  • Press the coal machine button to toggle steam production
